name: EGO (Efe Alaçamlı, VugarSevdimaliyev)
description:
Communication between two people can be complex, even you think it's simple. Kill your ego to communicate. 

Use left, right, up and down arrows to play and see the button press pattern instructions before each level.

Created for Global Game Jam 2018 @ BUG Istanbul. Highly inspired by NSFWare.

Vugar Sevdimaliyev - Design, Art

Göktuğ Taş - Music

Efe Alaçamlı - Design, Coding
